name: Starfire
passiveSkills: Reflect 100% of the damage received in the first round of battle by all allies as random damage back to each enemy
Gain a Perfect Force Shield for 1 turn at the start of your turn after the first round of battle
Grant Power Shield to all allies at the start of your turn after the first round of battle
Remove all Negative and Beneficial Effects from all allies and enemies and inflict Perfect Corruption for the duration of battle and Passive Disable for 2 turns on each enemy upon death.
